alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Buchanan, Benton, northwestern Jones, southern Delaware, northern Linn and northwestern Iowa Counties through 630 AM CST... At 559 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newhall to near Brooklyn. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Atkins, Shellsburg and Newhall around 605 AM CST. Palo around 610 AM CST. Hiawatha, Belle Plaine, Center Point and Toddville around 615 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Robins, Alburnett, Luzerne, Marengo, Central City, Blairstown, Paris, Norway and Prairieburg. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 25 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Jones; Linn
